Static Public Member Functions

static std::string Name ()

Detailed Description

This kernel is invoked by RPMDIntegrator to take one time step, and to get and set the state of system copies.

const RPMDIntegrator &  integrator,
bool  forcesAreValid 
) [pure virtual]

Execute the kernel.

Parameters:
contextthe context in which to execute this kernel
integratorthe RPMDIntegrator this kernel is being used for
forcesAreValidif the context has been modified since the last time step, this will be false to show that cached forces are invalid and must be recalculated
